description.value:
The magic in this rune sings in time with your attacks and coaxes you into finishing your opponent. When you critically hit a target that's taking persistent bleed damage, your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1}.

Activate r envision

Trigger You reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with the weapon

Effect You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to twice the creature's level. These Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
